body.text: Use Copilot Chat like a teammate: give it a role, constraints, and a way to verify the answer.

facts.title: Role
facts.value: "Act as a tech lead / editor / analyst..."

facts.title: Constraints
facts.value: "Must be accessible, secure, and under 200 lines..."

facts.title: Trade-offs
facts.value: "Give a fast approach and a robust approach, with pros/cons."

facts.title: Decision helper
facts.value: "I have 3 options. Create a decision matrix with risks and recommendation."

facts.title: Rewrite with intent
facts.value: "Rewrite this for: exec summary, then detailed plan. Keep facts unchanged."

facts.title: Plan + checklist
facts.value: "Break this into milestones with acceptance criteria and test strategy."

facts.title: Quality pass
facts.value: "Review this text/code for security, privacy, and edge cases. Suggest fixes."

body.text: Ask for a *short answer first*, then "expand only the section I choose". It keeps cards (and chats) useful on mobile.
